bwwExcerpt: Of course, the show's star is Vivian, played here with effervescent charm by Olivia Valli. She displays all the right moves, as well as the voice, that makes Vivian irresistible. In the musical, it takes a bit longer for Vivian to dispatch her streetwise manner in favor of more socially acceptable behavior. Rather than being displeased by Vivian's bluntness and occasional outbursts, Edward is more and more attracted to this elusive creature. KeyBank State Theatre - Cleveland, OH
